source.name: Oregon Recovery and Reinvestment Act Data (Prime Awards) - March, 2012
source.description: This spreadsheet contains prime awards created through the Oregon Recovery and Reinvestment Act (ARRA). Please note that these are preliminary data reflected from the most recent reporting period of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, including data through April 30, 2011. This data available for viewing through an interactive map site. For this, and other information on ARRA projects, please visit Oregon's Economic Recovery site: http://www.oregon.gov/recovery/. For the latest recovery award data, please visit http://www.recovery.gov.
